Literature.Title: Functional characterisation and modification of a novel Kunitzin peptide for use as an anti-trypsin antimicrobial peptide against drug-resistant Escherichia coli
Literature.Author: Wang Z, Ding W, Shi D, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=>256 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=51.48 µM,Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NCTC 11047(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=>128µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=>128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=>128µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=>256µM)
